name: Friendly Fire (cheezy_squeezy)
description:
Made by Aidan Campbell as part of GMTK 2020

A top-down shooter where you can't control when you shoot - your trigger pulls are on a timer. The catch is, your bullets repeatedly bounce off all walls, quickly turning the room into a prime example of bullet hell. Defeat all enemies to complete the level before you inadvertently kill yourself.

Where getting a minigun is a life saver in other games, it is a death sentence here.

And of course, the recoil of shooting pushes you back. Shoot to move ;). Good luck.

W, A, S, D - Move

Mouse - Aim

Tab - Restart level

Escape - Quit
